properties.markdownProperty:
In order to enhance application modular features and make configuring Proteus easier, it was decided to create the concept of "Profiles". The user may select between different profiles as it was previously done with archetypes repositories.
A profile is a pack that contains one archetype repository, one or multiple views (XSLT templates) and optionally its own resources (icons, translations, plugins).
Application may have one or multiples profiles built-in, the user can also select a profile from the host filesystem.
This overrides the select archetype feature. Profiles are built around an specific archetype repository. The profiles views and other resources are supposed to work with the profile's archetype repository.
